title: Portable independent source providing 50 Hz supply
fullText:
The purpose of this equipment is to enable testing of RCDs in cases where normal supply is not available.
Suitable sources include â€”
(a) a motor-generator set; or
(b) a battery-powered inverter with a nominally "pure sine wave" output.
The output of the source shall be sufficient to supply the required test current without causing voltage to drop.
NOTE Refer to Appendix A for additional information.
